options.title: Horizontal
list: Maximum horizontal panel size 120" wide x 48" tall.
Panels that are up to 35 7/8" wide will be 1 panel wide x 1 panel high.
Panels that are from 36" to 65 7/8" wide will be 2 panels wide x 1 panel high.
Panels that are from 66" to 95 7/8" wide will be 3 panels wide x 1 panel high.

options.title: Vertical
list: Maximum vertical panel size 36" wide x 120" tall.
Panels that are up to 47 7/8" high will be 1 panel high x 1 panel wide.
Panels that are from 48" to 95 7/8" high will be 2 panels high x 1 panel wide.

options.title: Options
options.content: N/A

options.title: Edges
options.content: detailed edge options panels 3/4".

options.title: Edges
options.content: detailed edge options panels 1 1/2".

options.title: Wood Edges
options.content: wood edge options panels 1 1/2".

modal.title: Panel Edge Options
modal.content: Available in all wood (except Engineered) and painted applications.
modal.note: Note: The joint is 7/8" from the front edge in solid wood applications.

options.title: FO - Square
list: 3/4" thick composite core
The front face, top, bottom, and one long edge will be finished.
Taped edges

options.title: FO - Detailed edge
list: 7/8" thick composite core
A detailed edge will be applied on the top, bottom, and one long edge.

options.title: Edges
options.content: detailed edge options.

options.title: GF
list: The front face, inside edge and inside gable face are finished.
Available in All materials.

options.title: GF-RETURN
list: The front face, inside edge, inside gable face and return are finished.
Available in All materials.

options.title: GF-M (Mitered)
list: The front face, inside edge and inside gable face are finished.
A mitered construction
Available only in wood species and painted applications.

options.title: GF-M-RETURN (Mitered)
list: The front face, inside edge, inside gable face and return are finished.
A mitered construction
Available only in wood species and painted applications.

options.title: On-site
options.content: if required to be applied on-site order a custom FE through the Order Desk.

options.title: On-site
options.content: if required to be applied on-site order a VLAM or PLAM Accessory in WQ.
